At a Meeting of the Couneil of the SURTEES Socmw, held in the Castle of Durham, on Tuesday, December the 6th, 1864, Mr. CHEVALLIER in the chair, it was ordered “ That a volume of the works of Symeon of Durham should be edited for this Society by Mr. Hodgson Hinde.”

JAMES RAINE,

Secretary.
